thread.title: Paddy Power Betfair to Merge U.S. Operations With FanDuel

author: Adria Calatayud
title: Paddy Power Betfair to Merge U.S. Operations With FanDuel
text:
Paddy Power Betfair PLC said Wednesday it has agreed to merge its U.S. operations with FanDuel Inc., in a deal that will give Paddy Power 61% ownership of the combined business.
The Dublin-based betting company said the deal helps position it for opportunities in the U.S. after a Supreme Court ruling last week opened the door to legal sports betting across the country.
